column3: News;Kep Province: On the morning of December 30
column4: in front of the Kep Provincial Court
column5: there was a festive contest of kite flying. A total of 261 kites
column7: Director of Kep Department of Culture and Fine Arts
column8: said that every New Year the administration of Kep holds the competition to celebrate.------ ------The battle for the highest flying kite was won by the Department of Agriculture
column9: Forestry and Fisheries of Kep. The kite from the Department of Environment won second prize. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/757812.html
